meanings.definition: Not pleasant to look at; unattractive.
meanings.sent1: The old, unsightlier building stood out among the modern ones.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the corner was even unsightlier than I remembered.
meanings.sent3: The unsightlier painting in the gallery made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her unsightlier outfit was a stark contrast to the elegant dresses at the party.
meanings.sent5: The unsightlier graffiti on the wall was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: More unpleasant or unattractive than something else.
meanings.sent1: The storm made the weather even unsightlier than before.
meanings.sent2: The unsightlier of the two options was chosen reluctantly.
meanings.sent3: The unsightlier dessert turned out to be surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: His unsightlier behavior at the party shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unsightlier side of the mountain was shrouded in mist.
